pli-tv-pvr6:1.4: [Sp 4.320](): _Dve āpattiyoti ūnavīsativassaṁ upasampādentassa pācittiyaṁ, sesesu sabbapadesu dukkaṭaṁ_, “Two offenses: there is an offense entailing confession for one ordaining a person less than twenty years old. There is an offense of wrong conduct in regard to all the other clauses.” In the following cases, I will just note the classes of offenses that are mentioned in the commentary.
pli-tv-pvr6:2.4: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr6:4.4: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr6:5.4: The offense entailing confession, the serious offense, and the offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr6:6.4: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr6:8.4: The serious offense, the offense entailing relinquishment and confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr6:14.4: The offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr6:15.4: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr6:16.4: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr6:17.4: The serious offense, and the offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-pvr6:20.4: The offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.
